title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You can set some unexpectedly positive energy into motion by initiating an important conversation today. While there are all sorts of topics that interest you, choose a subject that you believe might appeal to your prospective chat mate. Learning more about another person is a surefire way to grow in self-understanding, especially when you take the experience to heart. Appreciate the opportunity to make a meaningful connection and discover common ground. Author Ellen Parr wrote, "The cure for boredom is curiosity. There is no cure for curiosity." Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
